metadata.description: Sean Nault is a homicide detective on an alternate Earth where technology is powered exclusively by magic. Sean investigates a baffling series of murders committed by a means he's never seen before: the power of science. With the aid of Lenoir, a member of the ridiculed subculture of 'pragmatists' who believe science is more than the stuff of myths and children's stories and the 130 year old sorcerer, Winston Churchill, Sean uncovers an apocalyptic plot that will lead him to another dimension! Soon to be a motion picture starring Kevin Sorbo and Chris Judge.
metadata.name: Paradox
